mapper.sql: id, create_time, channel, ip, status, address, country, region, city, isp, user_id
mapper.insert: insert into risk_login_log (id, create_time, channel, ip, status, address, country, region, city, isp, user_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update risk_login_log set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, channel = #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isp = #{isp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select from risk_login_log where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by create_time desc
